"The Butterfly Defect",2006,4
At last...some (or maybe all...or maybe none) of the mystery surrounding Layla Miller unfolds, as we learn things about her background that no one--not X-Factor and not the readers--will have seen coming. Plus: The aftermath of Siryn's brutal mishap, Guido goes jogging, and an unexpected doctor makes a housecall.

32 PGS./Rated T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.99
